snippet: The government in Sri Lanka said Thursday that it had started the process to impeach the country’s chief justice, accusing her of overstepping her authority.
lead_paragraph: The government in Sri Lanka said Thursday that it had started the process to impeach the country’s chief justice, accusing her of overstepping her authority.

headline.seo: Sri Lanka: Government to Impeach Chief Justice
headline.main: Sri Lanka: Government Begins Process to Impeach Chief Justice
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: Government Begins Process to Impeach Chief Justice
